mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, P.NAME, P.STATUS, P.PRICE, P.COST, P.BRAND_ID, P.OWNER_ID, B.NAME AS BRAND_NAME FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN BRAND B ON P.BRAND_ID = B.ID ORDER BY P.ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (NAME, STATUS, COST, PRICE, BRAND_ID, OWNER_ID) VALUES (#{name}, #{status.name()}, #{cost}, #{price}, #{brandId}, #{businessOwnerId})
